info.description: AI-powered resume engineering using Hexagonal Architecture. Tailors resumes to specific job descriptions using LLM technology.
info.title: Chameleon Vitae API

get.description: Returns the health status of the service

post.description: Synchronizes a Firebase authenticated user with the local PostgreSQL database. Creates a new user if not exists, updates if exists (upsert behavior).
Triggers AI recalculation of the bullet's impact score against a job description

get.description: Returns a paginated list of experiences for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new experience for the authenticated user

get.description: Returns a specific experience with all its bullets

delete.description: Deletes an experience and all its bullets

post.description: Creates a new bullet point under an experience

get.description: Returns all spoken languages for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new spoken language for the authenticated user

get.description: Returns the authenticated user's complete profile

patch.description: Updates the authenticated user's profile fields

get.description: Returns a paginated list of resumes for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new resume draft from a job description

get.description: Returns a specific resume with full content

patch.description: Updates the status or content of a resume for manual adjustments

get.description: Generates a PDF file of the resume using the selected template

post.description: Uses AI to select and rewrite bullets for a specific job description

get.description: Returns all skills for the authenticated user, optionally filtered by category

post.description: Creates or updates multiple skills. Skills are matched by name - existing skills are updated, new ones are created.
Fetches a job posting URL and extracts structured data using Jina Reader

job_description.example: We are looking for a Senior Backend Engineer...

title.example: Senior Backend Engineer at Awesome Corp
